creator: fhanik@apache.org
text:
my patch makes it optional to force a file into the destination directory even
if the file listing inside the jar file is /file.txt

the attribute ignoreRootFiles can be set to true (default is false, same
behavior as now)

Haven't tested this on Windows, so the patch can be modified to handle those
cases too

Filip

creator: fhanik@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 9478
ignoreRootFiles attribute added to Expand.java
